customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It’s a little shakier than I would prefer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It’s a little shakier than I would prefer, and some extra hardware would be nice, but nothing bad enough to where I wouldn’t purchase it again. (My son stripped a bolt out putting it together, throwing us a little more challenge) It adds a great amount of usable space to my sons room, and added sleeping space if we need it! It looks great, and is a welcome change towards his teenage boy room!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Anne Mills

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay....
customer_reviews.text: We searched high and low for a metal loft bed with a desk for our 11 year old son. We came across this and figured for the price, it would be worth it. It’s okay. The desk is a great size. Comes in a lot of pieces, took my husband and I about an hour to put together. Kid loves it. Honestly, my only complaint, is the legs are not as wide as I would like, so the bed does shake when going up and down the ladder. Just not as sturdy as I would prefer. Overall, a decent buy. It’ll do for now, but I see us replacing this in a few years as he gets older and bigger.
customer_reviews.author: christopher demaria

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, one for each of our boys. They helped put it together (had a great time building them!) and were so impressed with how great they came out. They set up a gaming station underneath and love their gaming bedroom! They are 13 and 14, around 70 and 100 pounds, 4'10" and 5'1". They always talk about how comfortable they are! The only downsides are how much the beds move. We have thought about anchoring them into the wall and that may help provide some additional stability. The ladder rungs are also uncomfortable to climb, especially in bare feet.

product_meta.title: DHP Silver Screen Metal Bunk Bed with Ladder, Black, Twin
feature_bullets: Contemporary design that will compliment any décor.
Multifunctional furniture. Accommodates a Twin size bed in the top bunk and a Full size futon mattress in the lower bunk.
Futon below the bed converts easily from sitting to sleeping.
Sturdy metal construction. Spot clean it with a mild detergent and damp cloth
Weight limit upper bunk: 200 lb.; weight limit futon mattress: 600 lb.
